title: I have a question, please answer me!
content:
How come when Keen gets killed in K1-K3, he turns into this [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-deadkeenvort.gif[/img] and flies away? That doesn't make any sense.Signed, Harvey Smith
A proud member of the beta testing society
"I help entertain!" -Harvey
"I always try to consume interesting animals."-LevelLord
But it'd be ridiculous if he turned into a turkey sandwich.

I didn't even think of that, but why else does he become [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-deadkeenvort.gif[/img] when he dies?


[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-annoyed.gif[/img]:"> Signed, Harvey Smith
A proud member of the beta testing society
"I help entertain!" -Harvey
"I always try to consume interesting animals."-LevelLord

title: Re: ...
content: because Tom Hall said so. And Tom Hall is God.[img]http://www.denness.net/rpi/username/mr12000[/img]

title: Re: ...
content: Well, how many people come back alive when they die? How many people transport outside the building they were if they die inside it?Eat your veggies!

title: Re: ...
content:
What exactly is Keen in that image? He looks like just a head and some shuffling feat.--------------
[url=http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/][img]http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/imgs/links/pccwsml.gif[/img][/url]

title: heh
content: It's a simple, non-violent way for Keen to get out of the situation he's in without blood or the visual effect of falling over dead.

title: Re: heh
content:
Haer haer; many Apoge games fo this; the gruesome monster bash has its hero waving about when he dies; Wackey Wheels you fly backwards, hit the screen and slide down; Duke Nukum explodes in lots of small diamonds. Cosmo becomes an angel, [something that caused Djaser to break his monitor]

Exceptions are Dangerous Dave [Neat little graphics of stabbing, mutilations and such] and Jazz Jackrabbit [Turning to a pile of ash] as well as biomenace.A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/lind.jpg[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: heh
content:
Yeah, afterall, it's a GAME Harvey.. It isn't meant to be very realistic.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-oldy.gif[/img]
Personally I like more the way Keen gets out the screen in Keen 4-6. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Eat your veggies!
